title: AsiaFont Studio
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418084512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418084512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools): [Type Design Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418084512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Design%20Tools) : AsiaFont Studio**

Supporting more glyphs than [FontLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418084512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontLab) alone. AsiaFont Studio was an extended version of Fontlab for creation of double-byte characters such as Han (Chinese) characters.

The functionality of AsiaFont Studio was incorporated into Fontlab Studio 5, and is no longer available as a separate software application.

[http://www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/AsiaFont-Studio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418084512/http:/www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/AsiaFont-Studio/ "http://www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/AsiaFont-Studio/")
author: andreas
